section.heading: Youth Development Plan.
section.text: The Mayor shall oversee the implementation of District’s Youth Development Plan, which has been designed to:

para.text: Increase the quality of coordination and collaboration among all stakeholders to deliver city-funded youth services;
Advance the positive youth development philosophy and policy approach;
Effectively implement youth violence prevention and intervention strategies;
Provide for consistent and sustained investment in the city’s youth guided by positive youth development; and
Directly impact upon challenges affecting adolescent youth and disconnected youth.
